channel.title: Zombie Apocalypse Package release
channel.description:
zombie apocalypse not your average server.... zombies guns mayhem........ [img]http://i368.photobucket.com/albums/oo123/tatemo/Zombiescape%20Pictures/Weapons1.jpg[/img] Ak47 and variants... lr300 and variants.. dragunov and variants...mp5 and variants.. colt 45 and variants.. uzi and variants... desert eagle.... tazer, MG42, A FLAMETHROWER!! [img]http://img149.imageshack.us/img149/9894/5u52.png[/img] [img]http://img109.imageshack.us/img109/3056/62510244.png[/img] [img]http://img713.imageshack.us/img713/2093/69659404.png[/img]
here are the codes if your interested in advertising, etc.:
1st [code]http://img149.imageshack.us/img149/9894/5u52.png[/code]
2nd [code]http://img109.imageshack.us/img109/3056/62510244.png[/code]
3rd [code]http://img713.imageshack.us/img713/2093/69659404.png[/code]
Images thanks to Javafire (Full credit to him for the pics!) [img]http://img403.imageshack.us/img403/408/approvalproof.png[/img] First off.... [size=36pt]this is completely based off Tatemo's Zombiescape.[/size] http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,378544.0.html
Some changes i have made..... added over 10 new zombie enemies fully coded (meaning hp, drops, damage, aggression, etc.) Zombie Headquarters (5 stages, 1 with a if you will, maze) Added over 100 more zombies (now they are in ardounge, camelot, more in falador, more in draynor, and more in lumbridge!) THE ZOMBIE KNOWLEDGE DATABASE! Name:Zombie Lvl:15 Max hit:1 Aggressive? No Zombie Points for killing: 5 Hitpoints:45 [img]http://img638.imageshack.us/img638/6689/zombie1arc.png[/img]
Name:Zombie Lvl:38 Max hit:3 Aggressive? Yes Zombie Points for killing:7 Hitpoints:95 [img]http://img529.imageshack.us/img529/6163/zombie2arc.png[/img]
Name:Zombie Lvl:58 Max hit:4 Aggressive? Yes Zombie Points for killing:8 Hitpoints:115 [img]http://img18.imageshack.us/img18/6795/zombie3arc.png[/img]
Name:Zombie Lvl:78 Max hit:5 Aggressive? Yes Zombie Points for killing:9 Hitpoints:135 [img]http://img812.imageshack.us/img812/3542/zombie4arc.png[/img]
Name:Zombie Lvl:89 Max hit:6 Aggressive? Yes Zombie Points for killing:9 Hitpoints:165 [img]http://img812.imageshack.us/img812/8741/zombie5arc.png[/img]
Name:Zombie Lvl:98 Max hit:8 Aggressive? Yes Zombie Points for killing:11 Hitpoints:185 [img]http://img197.imageshack.us/img197/6703/zombie6arc.png[/img]
Name:Zombie Lvl:111 Max hit:10 Aggressive? Yes Zombie Points for killing:12 Hitpoints:225 [img]http://img24.imageshack.us/img24/4499/fghhi.png[/img]
Name:Zombie Lvl:138 Max hit:11 Aggressive? Yes Zombie Points for killing:14 Hitpoints:245 [img]http://img18.imageshack.us/img18/4291/fgjfhmujg.png[/img]
Name:Zombie: Lvl:148 Max hit:13 Aggressive? Yes Zombie Points for killing:14 Hitpoints:275 [img]http://img820.imageshack.us/img820/3167/gddfgdfg.png[/img]
Name:Zombie Lvl:168 Max hit:15 Aggressive?Yes Zombie Points for killing:16 Hitpoints:315 [img]http://img694.imageshack.us/img694/1449/dfgdhsdjh.png[/img] Notice how this one is bigger than the others?
Now you may be thinking "Oh, ok, same looks, they just get stronger, anything else?" as they get stronger, they begin too....... "change...."
Name:Zombie Lvl:184 Max hit:18 Aggressive?Yes Zombie Points for killing:19 Hitpoints:355 [img]http://img813.imageshack.us/img813/7874/hfghfjf.png[/img]
Name:Zombie Lvl:201 Max hit:22 Aggressive?Yes Zombie Points for killing:21 Hitpoints:400 [img]http://img695.imageshack.us/img695/5259/sfjsygherujhdszth.png[/img]
Name:Radiated Zombie Lvl:414 Max hit:25 Aggressive?Yes Zombie Points for killing:25 Hitpoints:800 [img]http://img190.imageshack.us/img190/3221/shdfhgf.png[/img]
Name:Alpha Zombie Lvl:???? Max hit:????? Aggressive?Yes Zombie Points for killing:100 Hitpoints:5000-25000, still unknown..... [img]http://img819.imageshack.us/img819/4081/djhdgjdgf.png[/img]
[size=36pt]ZOMBIE HEADQUARTERS[/size] There are 5 rooms in the hq, each will have a challenge Room 1 (95% complete) Room 2 (90% complete) Room 3 (85% complete) Room 4 (complete) Room 5 (Complete) Video of the server(old): http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WiccI3aTHIk [size=36pt]ZOMBIE LEVELS[/size] now if you have not noticed already from the zombie pictures, there is a zombie level, no level 15 is not the highest because i have it, but it goes up to level 20, here is the complete table:
0-49 = level 0 50-99 = level 2 100-199 = level 3 200-399 = level 4 400-799 = level 5 800-1599 = level 6 1600-2799 = level 7 2800-5600 = level 8 5600-11199 = level 9 11200-22399 = level 10 22400-44799 = level 11 44800-89599 = level 12 89600-179199 = level 13 179200-358399 = level 14 358400-716799 = level 15 716800-1433599 = level 16 1433600-2867199 = level 17 2867200-5734399 = level 18 5734400-11468799 = level 19 11468800+ = level 20
Class HQs
There are 3 classes: Army Special Operations Civilian resistance
each has its own hq Spec ops hq: 45% Army HQ: 0% Civilian resistance HQ: 0% http://www.mediafire.com/?tb8tvjpbj7nffd8
Now, a note before you download (if your downloading...)
This is NOT, i repeat NOT the server up to date like the one i have on my computer (the recently updated version)
This is a older version of the one i modified, not to different though, but some info here is outdated, cbf to fix however, its just info to get you familiar with the server.....
And NO ONE has the most recent up to date client and source of this, not even mursunari when i gave it to him to continue.. only i have it, so noob leechers have to fix stuff up :D
But other than that.. no anti leech.. enjoy

item.title: Zombie Apocalypse Package release
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

Baneful:

uhmm the models are pretty crappy lol. you should try making some models with 3d asspects and re-release

I did not make the models, they were already there from the zombie-scape release, thats why they are packed into the cache, the flamethrower and xm48 models are low detail as well because less lag on the client, and if there are lots of people in one place with that, and if it was high detailed, then that wouldnt be good.

Read full topic

item.title: Zombie Apocalypse Package release

item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

zombie apocalypse
not your average server…
zombies
guns
mayhem…

Weapons1.jpg512×631

Ak47 and variants… lr300 and variants… dragunov and variants…mp5 and variants… colt 45 and variants… uzi and variants… desert eagle… tazer, MG42, A FLAMETHROWER!!


here are the codes if your interested in advertising, etc.:

First off…
[size=36pt]this is completely based off Tatemo’s Zombiescape.[/size]

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Some changes i have made…
added over 10 new zombie enemies fully coded (meaning hp, drops, damage, aggression, etc.)
Zombie Headquarters (5 stages, 1 with a if you will, maze)
Added over 100 more zombies (now they are in ardounge, camelot, more in falador, more in draynor, and more in lumbridge!)
THE ZOMBIE KNOWLEDGE DATABASE!
Name:Zombie Lvl:15 Max hit:1 Aggressive? No Zombie Points for killing: 5 Hitpoints:45

Name:Zombie Lvl:38 Max hit:3 Aggressive? Yes Zombie Points for killing:7 Hitpoints:95

Name:Zombie Lvl:58 Max hit:4 Aggressive? Yes Zombie Points for killing:8 Hitpoints:115

Name:Zombie Lvl:78 Max hit:5 Aggressive? Yes Zombie Points for killing:9 Hitpoints:135

Notice how this one is bigger than the others?

Now you may be thinking “Oh, ok, same looks, they just get stronger, anything else?”
as they get stronger, they begin too… “change…”

[size=36pt]ZOMBIE HEADQUARTERS[/size]
There are 5 rooms in the hq, each will have a challenge
Room 1 (95% complete)
Room 2 (90% complete)
Room 3 (85% complete)
Room 4 (complete)
Room 5 (Complete)
Video of the server(old):


[size=36pt]ZOMBIE LEVELS[/size]
now if you have not noticed already from the zombie pictures, there is a zombie level, no level 15 is not the highest because i have it, but it goes up to level 20, here is the complete table:

0-49 = level 0
50-99 = level 2
100-199 = level 3
200-399 = level 4
400-799 = level 5
800-1599 = level 6
1600-2799 = level 7
2800-5600 = level 8
5600-11199 = level 9

44800-89599 = level 12
89600-179199 = level 13
179200-358399 = level 14
358400-716799 = level 15
716800-1433599 = level 16
1433600-2867199 = level 17
2867200-5734399 = level 18
5734400-11468799 = level 19
11468800+ = level 20

Class HQs

There are 3 classes:
Army
Special Operations
Civilian resistance

each has its own hq
Spec ops hq: 45%
Army HQ: 0%
Civilian resistance HQ: 0%
http://www.mediafire.com/?tb8tvjpbj7nffd8

Now, a note before you download (if your downloading…)

This is NOT, i repeat NOT the server up to date like the one i have on my computer (the recently updated version)

This is a older version of the one i modified, not to different though, but some info here is outdated, cbf to fix however, its just info to get you familiar with the server…

And NO ONE has the most recent up to date client and source of this, not even mursunari when i gave it to him to continue… only i have it, so noob leechers have to fix stuff up

But other than that… no anti leech… enjoy
